text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines
text.Response A: This Chrome Plated Angel ornament features Austrian Swarovski Crystal. The design is 6.5 IN x 2 IN x 2 IN. This is an original Crystal Delight ornament! This Chrome Plated Swarovski Crystals sparkle beautifully against the light featuring superb craftsmanship and will be the finishing touch to just about any room in your home! This is absolutely the perfect gift for Valentine's day or Mother's day!
text.Response B: Ellison SIZZIX- Orignal dies feature a steel-rule construction to make amazing shapes. These dies can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock as well as fabric foam vellum and other materials. They are compatible with the Original Sizzie machine as well as the BIGkick and Bigshot machines. Small Dies- 2.375 x 2.75 Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75

696.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines

Response A

This Chrome Plated Angel ornament features Austrian Swarovski Crystal. The design is 6.5 IN x 2 IN x 2 IN. This is an original Crystal Delight ornament! This Chrome Plated Swarovski Crystals sparkle beautifully against the light featuring superb craftsmanship and will be the finishing touch to just about any room in your home! This is absolutely the perfect gift for Valentine's day or Mother's day!

Response B

Ellison SIZZIX- Orignal dies feature a steel-rule construction to make amazing shapes. These dies can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock as well as fabric foam vellum and other materials. They are compatible with the Original Sizzie machine as well as the BIGkick and Bigshot machines. Small Dies- 2.375 x 2.75 Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
